solution_line_template: After doubling he was able to hold {initial_weight_per_hand}*{doubling_factor}=<<{initial_weight_per_hand}*{doubling_factor}={weight_after_doubling_per_hand}>>{weight_after_doubling_per_hand} kg per hand

So he lifted {weight_after_doubling_per_hand}+{specialization_gain_per_hand}=<<{weight_after_doubling_per_hand}+{specialization_gain_per_hand}={total_weight_per_hand}>>{total_weight_per_hand} kg per hand
That means he lifted a total of {total_weight_both_hands} kg
